alert.note: Alert for Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 1:41PM EDT until August 10 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Onslow County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 141 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Edgecomb, or over Surf City, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, North Topsail Beach, Swansboro, Hubert, Folkstone, Dixon, Hammocks Beach, Onslow Beach, Hammocks Beach State Park, Sneads Ferry, Sea View Pier and Holly Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
